AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sensitive artiste
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional painter and photographer, visiting strange worlds and cataloging [PAWN_possessive] experience in the form of interpretative art.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ritual Assassin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tool of the Hanar, an instrument shaped to be good at one thing - death. [PAWN_nameDef] does not feel responsible for these deaths, as [PAWN_pronoun] was wielded as a tool by the Hanar. They are the ones who are responsible for the killings.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Slave Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a family of Drell who were ripped from their colony world into the arms of a band of marauding slavers. [PAWN_possessive] was worked to the bone on a daily basis, but gained strength through it, and [PAWN_possessive] quietly collected resources until [PAWN_possessive] could escape. Their eventual flight from the slavers was bloody, but [PAWN_possessive] claimed [PAWN_possessive]'d never ever work hard for an uncaring boss again.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Imperilled child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When [PAWN_nameDef] was younger, [PAWN_pronoun] lived on the barren world of Rakhana. With barely any food available, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to make food with a lot of different items.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Booze Bootlegger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found semi-steady employment escorting shipments of Hanar spirits aboard the rare trade-convoy headed out of their stations. [PAWN_possessive] skills helped to sort out issues, whether with the smoking end of a gun barrel or some smooth diplomacy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bitter refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was brought up by parents who were bitter about having to leave their homeworld Rakhana behind, along with all those they lost during the evacuation. Thus, [PAWN_pronoun] has inherited this bitterness against the Hanar and refused to live alongside [PAWN_possessive] people on Kahje.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Prothean worshipper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was fully immersed in [PAWN_possessive] education and came to fully believe in the Hanarâ€™s devotion to the Enkindlers. Spending [PAWN_possessive] free time cleaning and learning in Enkindler temples, [PAWN_pronoun] was trusted and dedicated enough that [PAWN_pronoun] was given permission to visit Prothean shrines and basked in their glory.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sterile upbringing
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As [PAWN_possessive] parents took lessons from the lifestyles of the Quarians, [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many Drell children who was brought up in the sterile environment of a constantly voyaging spaceship. Growing up among the humming internals, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to differentiate the subtle differences in background noise and learned much in the ways of keeping the ship running smoothly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Citadel upbringing
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the Wards, one of the five arms of the Citadel, where [PAWN_possessive] parents settled down in a less humid environment. Life was never really simple, and sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight for what [PAWN_pronoun] had but [PAWN_pronoun] also had [PAWN_possessive] friends to rely on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Voracious reader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a deep and real love for reading books and made a habit of reading as much as [PAWN_pronoun] could get [PAWN_possessive] hands on. Due to [PAWN_possessive] eidetic memory, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to speed read so [PAWN_pronoun] could read even more as there is practically more books than [PAWN_pronoun] could ever read in [PAWN_possessive] lifetime. Ironically, [PAWN_pronoun] has difficulty in actually remembering the contents of the books unless given an external stimulus.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kinetic learner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to convince a former Asari commando to train [PAWN_pronoun] in an unusual manner by getting beaten up and then attempting to imitate those moves. Not without payment, the Asari actually honed and improved her skills as they were reflected back by [PAWN_nameDef], who in turn learned to move [PAWN_possessive] body as fast as [PAWN_pronoun] possibly could through purely reactionary behaviour.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spymaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was employed by high-ranking officials on the Citadel in order to counter any potential attempts at assassination. Because [PAWN_pronoun] has an eidetic memory, any otherwise unnoticeable details were meticulously analysed and documented. This all ended when [PAWN_possessive] contractor refused to renew [PAWN_possessive] protection fee only to slip and fall the next day, breaking their neck.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gastronomist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: By combining eidetic memory and [PAWN_possessive] keen sense of taste and smell, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to find employment in many high-end restaurants. Rather uniquely, [PAWN_pronoun] experiences memory recall through different dishes and thus has sought to share [PAWN_possessive] lifestyle with customers by serving them dishes based on their own personal life story.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Indentured servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In order to be able to afford a lifestyle that prevented the development of Kepralâ€™s Syndrome, [PAWN_defName] signed an indentured servantâ€™s contract to work in an arid environment. The long, labour intensive hours meant that [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time in out-of-body experiences so that [PAWN_pronoun] could enjoy life more outside of work hours.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Walking diary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Despite the prevalence of technology, some people prefer to have alternative means to look up information. [PAWN_nameDef] managed to find such work as someone with too much money on their hands took a keen interest in [PAWN_possessive] eidetic memory as a sort of living, breathing diary who learns all of their appointments and people of interest. It was not the most meaningful of work, but [PAWN_pronoun] did manage to learn quite a few interesting things.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Performance sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Being able to remember every intricate detail has allowed [PAWN_nameDef] to make quite a name for [PAWN_possessive]self and quite a bit of money. As part of [PAWN_possessive] artistic talents, [PAWN_pronoun] has a gathering of clientele whom [PAWN_pronoun] greets briefly before blindfolding [PAWN_possessive]self, shaking someoneâ€™s hand and then carving small sculptures made with material the same shade as the clientâ€™s eye colour.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Enkindled proselytizer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fully embraced the Hanar as [PAWN_possessive] saviours and decided to help spread their belief in the Enkindlers across known space. Not everyone is welcoming and light shines brightest in the darkest places, as such [PAWN_pronoun] was taught to defend [PAWN_possessive]self against those who would seek to halt [PAWN_possessive] holy mission.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Biological researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years working alongside the Hanar in trying to find a cure to the disease plaguing [PAWN_possessive] people. All the time [PAWN_pronoun] spent analysing Kepralâ€™s syndrome on both living and dead Drell has taken a toll on [PAWN_possessive] soul.
